Sql.query: insert into cpa_total_demanda ( cpatdcodi, cpatdanio, cpatdajuste, cparcodi, cpatdtipo, cpatdmes, cpatdusucreacion, cpatdfeccreacion, cpatdusumodificacion, cpatdfecmodificacion ) values ( :cpatdcodi, :cpatdanio, :cpatdajuste, :cparcodi, :cpatdtipo, :cpatdmes, :cpatdusucreacion, :cpatdfeccreacion, :cpatdusumodificacion, :cpatdfecmodificacion )
select cpatdcodi, cpatdanio, cpatdajuste, cparcodi, cpatdtipo, cpatdmes, cpatdusucreacion, cpatdfeccreacion, cpatdusumodificacion, cpatdfecmodificacion from cpa_total_demanda order by cpatdcodi asc

select cpatdcodi, cpatdanio, cpatdajuste, cparcodi, cpatdtipo, cpatdmes, cpatdusucreacion, cpatdfeccreacion, cpatdusumodificacion, cpatdfecmodificacion from cpa_total_demanda where cpatdcodi = :cpatdcodi
select count(cpatdcodi) as contador from cpa_total_demanda
select count(cpatdcodi) as contador from cpa_total_demanda where cparcodi = {0} and cpatdtipo = '{1}' and cpatdmes = {2}

select cpatdcodi, cpatdanio, cpatdajuste, cparcodi, cpatdtipo, cpatdmes, cpatdusucreacion, cpatdfeccreacion, cpatdusumodificacion, cpatdfecmodificacion from cpa_total_demanda where cparcodi = {0} and cpatdtipo = '{1}' and cpatdmes = {2} order by cpatdcodi asc
select cparestado as estado from cpa_revision where cparcodi = {0}
select count(cpapcodi) as contador from cpa_porcentaje where cparcodi = {0}

select nvl(cpaemptipo, '') cpaemptipo from cpa_empresa where cpaempestado = 'A' and cparcodi = {0} and cpaemptipo = '{1}' and (select trim(emprnomb) from si_empresa se where cpa_empresa.emprcodi = se.emprcodi) = trim('{2}')
